title: RTP R User Group
text:
Welcome to the RTP R User Group Website!
To join our meetup group, please visit or Meetup page!
The RTP R User Group is an excellent resource for anyone interested in learning more about R, an open-source programming language and software environment for statistical computing and graphics.
By joining the RTP R User Group, you can connect with other like-minded individuals and learn from their experiences. You can also gain access to quality tutorials and resources on R and related topics, as well as participate in events and workshops that can help you become more proficient in the language.
People of all levels are welcome to attend! The group also provides support and advice to those who are just starting out in R. With the help of the RTP R User Group, you can take advantage of the many benefits that R can offer.

title: How can I contribute?
text: Would like to become co-organizer, contribute or present? We are always looking for the R enthusiasts who would like to share their knowledge, experience, and expertise with our community! If you are passionate about R and want to showcase your skills to a group of like-minded individuals, this is an excellent opportunity for you. No matter your level of experience, we welcome presentations on a wide range of topics including helpful R tips, getting started with R, data wrangling/visualization, statistical analysis, machine learning, and more. Our R User Group meetings provide an informal and supportive environment for learning and sharing knowledgeabout R. To submit a presentation proposal, please send us a brief abstract of your talk, along with your name and contact information to rtp.r.usergroup@gmail.com, and indicate that you are interested in presenting at our RTP R UseR Group.

title: How can I contribute?
text:
Would like to become co-organizer, contribute or present?
We are always looking for the R enthusiasts who would like to share their knowledge, experience, and expertise with our community!
If you are passionate about R and want to showcase your skills to a group of like-minded individuals, this is an excellent opportunity for you. No matter your level of experience, we welcome presentations on a wide range of topics including helpful R tips, getting started with R, data wrangling/visualization, statistical analysis, machine learning, and more.
Our R User Group meetings provide an informal and supportive environment for learning and sharing knowledge about R. To submit a presentation proposal, please send us a brief abstract of your talk, along with your name and contact information to rtp.r.usergroup@gmail.com, and indicate that you are interested in presenting at our RTP R User Group.

title: Welcome to our Meetup Page!
text: We are happy to announce that we have a Meetup page where you can find all past and upcoming events. The first event is yet to be announced so stay tuned!
